package.name: Net_IDNA2
package.description: This package helps you to encode and decode punycode strings easily.
package.notes: * Added initial support for IDNA2008. This is needed for characters like the German "Eszett" which would otherwise be turned into "ss" during nameprep. Use $n->setParams('version', '2008') to use the "new" IDNA-encoding. Default is still IDNA2003 for backwards-compatibility. Further aspects of IDNA2008-encoding (for example some checks) should be added later according to RFCs. * #16466: Unit tests (testcaseses from draft-josefsson-idn-test-vectors; thanks to Daniel) * Unit tests (coverage, refactoring/cleanup, more tests) * #17542: URIs get mangled when decoding (UTF8-fix) * Codingstyle fixes * fixed handling of URLs with more than a domain-name (fixed opposite of parse_url()) * Added specialized and spl exceptions * #17533: Releases and roles do not seem to work.

release.notes: QA Release Bug #17430 Multiple Net_IDNA class declarations Warning: This package is now split between Net_IDNA (php4) and Net_IDNA2 (php5)
